title: 88: Episode #88: Movie Talk Galore
itunes:title: Episode #88: Movie Talk Galore
description:
• We take a moment to remember the victims of the Virginia Tech tragedy.
  • We’re proud to announce the Pickle Pack! Join for exclusive videos, blogs, photos, and more!
  • The announcement about Jamie that launched a thousand fangirls’ anguished cries.
  • It’s all OOTP all the time this week!
  • We chat about certain changes made to the dementors and Voldemort’s facial features.
  • What is with the Priori Incantatem going on between Dumbledore and Voldemort?
  • Umbridge is already making us angry (it’s a good thing!).
  • Ben has a problem with Emma!
  • In addition, we give the new site, movie poster, and game trailer a review.
  • We review listener feedback on the trailers.
  • Chicken Soup for the MuggleCast Soul.
  • Andrew is self-conscious making the closing statements after the hilarious and entertaining and completely unnecessary mockery on Episode 87.
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
